title: How many views should I get as a beginner blogger? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on your content and ranking but as a beginner as you have no experience and not much exposure to the web so there will be not much of the traffic for you. To increase this you can use google webmasters and analytics . Webmasters will guide you every steps from submitting sitemap and robots.txt which is very important. It also shows for which keyword you rank

You should not expect a lot of visitors from day One. It takes a lot of time to build an authority. In the beginning if you blog daily you can expect to get some organic traffic from the first week depending upon the keywords and the content you are creating. Then after some weeks when you get some momentum you can expect to get some traffic.There is not any fixed number though.All will depend on your effort,your niche and competition.
